title: Election denialism makes a stand in Nevada, with Jon Ralston and Bridget Bowman
description: Primary results last night in South Carolina, Nevada and across the country seem to show — once more — Trump's undying influence over the Republican Party. Jon Ralston, CEO of the Nevada Independent, and Bridget Bowman, NBC News political deputy editor, join Chuck to preview some of the midterm's marquee general elections — now just taking shape.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
